item.title: Report E-2023110059
item.description:
Report E-2023110059

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: BELLE
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported a cargo release at terminal XCA. It was reported that approximately 4.7 gallons of Asphaltic Driveway Sealer was released from a 4.7-gallon metal pail due to the pallet breaking and puncturing the metal pail. The release impacted the inside of trailer #3156733. The terminal personnel was comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site. (1) 10 gallon DM containing one 4.7-gallon metal pail of Asphaltic Driveway Sealer and Oil Dri were staged and left onsite for the terminal to manage.
